Symptom: Do you ever feel like you're *pretending* to be okay more than you actually are?
Echo-Friendly Description: Like you’ve mastered looking fine while quietly falling apart inside?

Symptom: Do you sometimes feel deeply unseen — even in rooms full of people?
Echo-Friendly Description: Like you're physically there but emotionally invisible?

Symptom: Do you catch yourself trying to control tiny details when you feel emotionally out of control?
Echo-Friendly Description: Like lining things up or rewriting the same sentence — not because you want to, but because it soothes something?

Symptom: Do you ever get a surge of panic with no warning — like your body suddenly flips into alarm mode?
Echo-Friendly Description: Like fear arrives before a thought explains it?

Symptom: Do you sometimes feel like your brain keeps switching tabs, but never settles on one thing?
Echo-Friendly Description: Like there's noise in the background of everything you do?

Symptom: Do you ever feel broken in a way that doesn’t show on the outside?
Echo-Friendly Description: Like there’s a crack somewhere no one else sees, but you feel it every day?

Symptom: Do you hold in how you're feeling so you don’t ‘ruin the vibe’ for others?
Echo-Friendly Description: Like protecting the peace means swallowing your truth?

Symptom: Do you sometimes want connection but push people away when they get too close?
Echo-Friendly Description: Like closeness burns and distance feels safer — even if it hurts?

Symptom: Do you feel like you're running from something you can’t name — even when life is calm?
Echo-Friendly Description: Like you’re chased by something that lives inside you?

Symptom: Do you ever feel like the world is happening *at* you, not with you?
Echo-Friendly Description: Like you're just reacting to it all, trying not to break?
